Key: Congratulations, Itsuka.
...What are you talking about, Tonomachi?
Congratulations, Shido-kun.
Congratulations!
*whimper*... Congratulations, darling...
Hm. I suppose I'll give you my blessing.
Congratulations. This truly is nice.
Wait. What are you talking about...?!

Hmph. Yeah, even if you get married, I guess I'll
always be your little sister.

Married...? What are you talking about... Wait, I'm
getting married?!

Hey, Shido-san. I can't believe you'd marry her. You
really are cruel.
Kurumi, not you too?! What are you talking about?!
(Marry?! ME? Then my wife would be...)

...Looking at who you chose, Shido, I have no choice
but to take a step back...)
Yeah. But Shido chose her. So I must be happy for him!
Everyone...

(Everyone congratulated me and I walked toward my
wife-to-be.)
(And there, waiting for me, was of course―)
Shido-san... U-Um...
Yoshino...
C-Con... Congratulations.
U-Um... Congratulations on your marriage.

Huh? Wait I mean if I'm going to get married it'd be
with y―
You better take good care of Yoshinon!
WHAAAAAAAAAAAAAT?!

Yoshinon... is my precious... precious friend. But I
have faith... that you'll make her happy, Shido-
san...!

Wait, why are you teary-eyed... I mean, Yoshinon and
me married?! How?! WHY?!
Oh, come on, Shido-kun. We've loved one another\nso passionately. You were the one who proposed to\nme, remember?
Please... be happy... *sob*...
Now, now! My sweet darling, I want you to give me\na deep kiss like you usually do ♪
WHYYYYYYY?!
Shido-san... Shido-san...!
...*gasp*...?! AHHHHHH!
AHHHH?!
*pant*... *pant, pant*... H-Huh? A-A... dream?
What's the matter, Shido-kun? You were groaning.

And you're... sweating a lot... Did you have... a
nightmare?
Y-Yeah... Well, I guess you could say that.
Hmmm. Then take a good look at adorable Yoshinon's\nface and calm down. Come on. What do you say?

(I-I couldn't bring myself to say that Yoshinon... was
the cause of my nightmare.)
Y-Yeah... Thanks...
Why are you being so shy? It's just you and me.

(I remembered the dream I just had, and I looked
away.)
U-Um... Are you okay...?

Y-Yeah... Sorry. It was just a weird dream. Or rather,
it was surprising.
If you say so, Shido-kun. It sure must have been a\nweird one.
...What kind of dream was it?
Oh... um...

You just looked at Yoshinon and looked away, didn't\nyou? Considering that... Shido-kun... Did you have a\nnaughty dream?	
Message	Shido	NO! Not at all!	
Message	Yoshino	Oh... You didn't...?	
Message	Shido	No... I wish I had. Then I wouldn't be so stressed
...Really?
Yeah.
I see. Then what kind of dream was it?

...To put it simply... Uh, I had a dream... of marrying
someone that wasn't you, Yoshino.
Th-Then... Who... did you get married to?
Tohka-chan? Kotori-chan? Or Kaguya-chan or\nYuzuru-chan? Or even Miku-chan?

All wrong... Is it even a girl? Well... I guess it
is... a girl."	
Message	Yoshino	...So who... did you dream... you got married to?	
Message	Shido	It was someone I could never marry under normal
Hmm. I don't get it. So basically, Shido-kun, you had\na fantasy dream that made you groan?
Something like that...
Is something wrong...?

Oh, I was just wondering how you came to wake me
up...

U-Um... Sorry for entering your room without
permission...
But don't worry, we got Kotori-chan's permission.\nI hope you forgive us.

...I want to say it's fine, but considering what just
happened, I'm embarrassed that you saw me sleeping.

(Not only that, but after a dream like the one I just
had, I don't even know how I should be acting right
now. I might have even talked in my sleep...)
Then why don't you see Yoshi's sleeping face?\nThen it'd be even.
But Yoshino wouldn't like that, right?

Th-That's not true... Although I would be a bit
embarrassed...
...I see.
Yeah, yeah. Can't be helped right? Yoshino doesn't\nlet her guard down in front of you, Shido-kun. You'd\nlike to see her so defenseless, huh?
...Yeah, yeah. Someday.
Gosh, you're so apathetic. You could be a little more\ninterested in Yoshino, you know?

What's the point in being interested in things people
don't want you to be interested in? Anyways, I'm going
to go change, so wait for me in the living room.
O-Okay. Um, Shido-san...
Hm? What is it?
...Good morning.
Ah... Good morning.

(Yoshino smiled and left the room. I noticed myself
being enchanted by her, and I snapped out of it.)
Today is going to be a good day.

(I'm not sure about the dream, but Yoshino woke me
up. I have a feeling something good will happen
today.)
